author: Morgan Park
description: Splitgate 2's battle royale mode is live now.
title: 'I grew up playing Halo, I'm tired of playing the same Call of Duty every year, and I wish we could have Titanfall 3!': Splitgate 2 boss slams the state of shooters as he surprise launches a battle royale mode

author: Andy Chalk
description: ILL lives up to its name, though enjoyers of drop kicking mutant baby are in for a treat.
title: The Summer Game Fest just rolled out what is very likely the most disturbing videogame trailer I have ever seen

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Tragically, there's no giant vampire lady in sight.
title: RE9 is real: The next Resident Evil just got a surprise SGF reveal, and it's launching in February

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: And there's an open beta on the way, too.
title: Wildgate, the match-based Sea of Thieves in space from Mike Morhaime's new game company, launches this July

author: Morgan Park
description: Mikkelsen's LeChiffre is Hitman's next elusive target, and he's available to kill right now.
title: Mads Mikkelsen is reprising his Casino Royale role to become Hitman's next elusive target

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Become the mayor of Dinosaur City this October.
title: The Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer disappointingly doesn't show anyone being bitten in half by a T-Rex, but it does have Jeff Goldblum's dulcet tones and a release date

author: Tyler Wilde
description: Last Flag is a 5v5 CTF shooter with some neat twists.
title: The CTF shooter is making a comeback thanks to the manager and lead singer of Imagine Dragons, who 'grew up playing capture the flag in the woods at night with flashlights'

author: Dominic Tarason
description: The gang's all here (including Anamanaguchi) for Scott Pilgrim EX.
title: There's a new Scott Pilgrim brawler coming from the makers of… the old Scott Pilgrim brawler (and TMNT: Shredder's Revenge)

author: Justin Wagner
description: The retrofuturistic shooter is back with more color and more Freddie Mercury.
title: Atomic Heart 2 is coming and it looks like an open-world genre mashup of a bunch of other sci-fi dystopias

author: Andy Chalk
description: The DLC-turned-standalone game dropped a new trailer at tonight's Summer Game fest showcase.
title: After 3 years of waiting, Dying Light: The Beast will finally arrive in August

author: Harvey Randall
description: I've got no release dates to hold me down.
title: It's a real game—Lies of P: Overture, the Sekiro-like's first major DLC, shadowdrops during Summer Game Fest and is available now

author: Tyler Colp
description: I'm digging this little mouse game.
title: The Shovel Knight dev's new gothic action game has a demo that has awakened the GBA kid in me

author: Christopher Livingston
description: The Cube is a multiplayer MMO from Mundfish that was just announced at Summer Games Fest.
title: Fight across the surface of a giant Rubik's Cube built from chunks of other planets in yet another unhinged shooter from the brains behind Atomic Heart

author: Morgan Park
description: It's never too late to become an Onimusha guy, right?
title: Capcom continues its victory lap with killer new Onimusha: Way of the Sword trailer at Summer Game Fest

author: Tyler Wilde
description: A new Danish studio, Raw Power Games, is behind the medieval sandbox RPG shown early in this year's Summer Game Fest stream.
title: Chronicles: Medieval is a stunning sandbox RPG coming in 2026—despite a past commitment to using generative AI, the studio now says the game is '100% handcrafted'

author: Andy Chalk
description: Fight for the Iron Throne at the head of one of the Great Houses, or the armies of the Night King.
title: Go to war for Westeros in a new Game of Thrones RTS coming in 2026

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: A new challenger approaches.
title: Sonic Racing: Crossworlds just declared war on Mario Kart by becoming the true Smash Bros. of kart racers, bringing drivers from Minecraft, Persona, Yakuza—oh, and Hatsune Miku

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: You put enough pretty people in the same space, and this kind of thing is bound to happen.
title: Square Enix just revealed a 'murder mystery action game' and as far as I can tell it's like Among Us in a spooky mansion full of hot people

author: Morgan Park
description: The showdown between two big extraction shooters is set for Fall.
title: Arc Raiders sets release date for Fall 2025, just 37 days after Marathon

author: Andy Chalk
description: The world's busiest voice actor gets a little busier.
title: Troy Baker becomes a mouse with a machine gun in Mouse: PI for Hire, coming later this year

author: Harvey Randall
description: So stupid, so edgy, so sold.
title: They put a revolver in Dark Souls—Mortal Shell 2 looks like it wandered out of an edgy teenager's heavy-metal fantasies, and I cannot wait to play it

author: Andrea Shearon
description: No need to pick just one, Dune lets you dabble in a little of everything thanks to its class trainers.
title: All Dune: Awakening trainer locations

author: Andy Chalk
description: The beloved composer, who created the music for every Larian game up to Divinity: Original Sin, died unexpectedly in 2015.
title: 'Forever cherished for who you were and what you helped achieve': 10 years after his death, Larian Studios pays tribute to composer Kirill Pokrovsky

author: Wes Fenlon
description: We're live and locked in for a day packed full of announcements and WORLD PREMIERES.
title: Summer Game Fest 2025 live: Get ready for the news deluge

author: Rich Stanton
description: On Her Majesty's Smuggest Service.
title: James Bond doesn't need an origin story: IO's game looks great, but why has it turned 007 into a baby-faced Nathan Drake?

author: Harvey Randall
description: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands isn't on the list, but other than that? It's all here.
title: The Borderlands cup overfloweth with a huge sale—1-3, The Pre-Sequel, all their DLCs, and one very good Telltale game are available for $36

author: Emma Withington
description: Oblivion fans are feasting, but there’s room for more.
title: Oblivion Remastered’s improvements have Oblivion’s meme king hopeful Fallout 3 and Fallout New Vegas will see similar glow-ups: ‘[It’s] so much better and exactly what I have wanted for years’

author: Elie Gould
description: "There is still something if we peel back their helmets."
title: 'John Nightreign doesn't have a face': YouTuber manages to uncover all but one of Elden Ring Nightreign's hidden Nightfarer faces, 'leaving his appearance a mystery'

author: Elie Gould
description: "The challenges you shall face are set in stone."
title: Ro-Souls 3 is 'a sharp and precise recreation' of Dark Souls 3 in Roblox, and it's training up a whole new generation of soulslike demons

author: Andy Edser
description: And what a wonderful cast of characters we have to admire.
title: If you fondly remember the wonders of terrible graphics card box art like me, there's now a book available with a collection of some of the greatest hits

author: Kara Phillips
description: Three new adventures have been hinted towards, and I can see a lot of players getting excited.
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley has shared its new roadmap for the rest of 2025, and it looks like one character fans have been asking for since launch is finally coming to stay

author: Harvey Randall
description: Do not ask for who the Skong tolls, it tolls for Skong.
title: You could cut the tension with a needle—7 SteamDB changes in the past week have Silksong hopefuls wondering if the final hour is upon us

author: Ted Litchfield
description: The Art of Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is set to release a month after the a long-awaited RPG.
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is getting a fancy art book from Dark Horse that'll shed some light on its rebooted development

author: Jeremy Laird
description: The figures aren't quite recent enough to show the impact of AMD's latest GPUs...
title: A new report indicates Intel's latest Battlemage GPUs are a total failure and AMD's gaming graphics market share fell to just 8% but overall graphics cards sales are up

author: Jeremy Laird
description: Does two modes in one monitor make for a singularly compelling gaming experience?
title: Asus ROG Strix XG27UCG gaming monitor review

author: James Bentley
description: It does feel surprisingly smooth, though.
title: Having spent time testing the Switch 2 mouse controls I no longer think it's a gimmick, but it just cannot compare to a gaming mouse

author: Rich Stanton
description: "We saw a lot of reactions from other games to what we were doing and that to me speaks volumes."
title: XDefiant is now ex-Defiant as the game closes and its executive producer leaves Ubisoft: 'We just didn't have the gas to go the distance'

author: Andy Edser
title: Trick venting solutions look like the hot new thing in PC case design and this low-vented Asus model has me more than a little intrigued

author: Dominic Tarason
description: Onion Games returns to form with Stray Children.
title: The long-awaited successor to cult hit 'anti-RPG' Moon hits Steam later this year

author: Rory Norris
description: Turn blood into much-needed water.
title: How to use blood purifiers in Dune: Awakening

author: Robin Valentine
description: Forza, Call of Duty, Gears of War, Fable, and many more.
title: Xbox Games Showcase 2025 preview: The big games and developers to expect on Sunday's livestream

author: Andy Edser
description: Staplers and LCD displays: a terrible, no-good, very bad combination.
title: A Gamestop store has reportedly been stapling customer receipts to Switch 2 boxes and puncturing holes in the screens

author: Dominic Tarason
description: SourceWorld lets you live the life of a gig economy pandimensional hitman.
title: Half-Life 2 becomes a loot-hoarding roguelike dungeon crawl in this Next Fest mod demo

author: Emma Withington
description: This is what dreams are made of.
title: Dune: Awakening's Steam reviews have done a complete 180, climbing the ranks to Very Positive just a day after a player pile-on: ‘This game is great with friends, and lets me live out my fantasy of getting eaten by a sandworm’

author: Kara Phillips
description: Bring your favourite mobile game to your desktop in a few steps.
title: How to play Monopoly GO on PC

author: Rory Norris
description: Get across the dunes in record time by unlocking this confusing fast travel system.
title: How to fast travel in Dune: Awakening

author: Rich Stanton
description: "Tim, you're gonna make Tim Cook retire early."
title: Epic CEO Tim Sweeney takes yet another victory lap after Apple's latest appeal fails: 'The long national nightmare of the Apple tax is ended'

author: Sean Martin
description: Collect the latest livestream Primogem bonus before it expires.
title: All Genshin Impact 5.7 livestream codes

author: Jeremy Laird
description: A tiny but timely reminder of a more optimistic era of computing...
title: Sneeze and this incredibly tiny postage-stamp-sized Atari computer recreation is a goner

author: Elie Gould
description: Imagine being one hit away from a win and poof, no server.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign servers shut down this morning 'to improve expedition matchmaking' but it's royally screwed some unprepared players

author: Dominic Tarason
description: Long considered lost media, Duke Nukem: D-Day is rediscovered a quarter-century late.
title: A long-lost Duke Nukem prototype resurfaces after 24 years

author: Tyler Wilde
description: When and where to catch Geoff Keighley's big show, and what to expect.
title: How to watch the Summer Game Fest livestream
